artifact_loc_error: The location was empty. Something may have gone wrong.
config_artifact_average_artifact_spots_d: Estimated amount of artifacts to spawn
config_artifact_spawn_farm_description: Whether artifact spots should be spawned on the farm.
config_artifact_force_average_spawn_spot: For the mod to spawn as many artifact spots as possible without going over the Average amt set. (May cause major lag)
config_artifact_show_spawned_spots_descr: Enable or Disable if we should show artifact spots.
